forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 58. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
The early hours of Wednesday in Downtown San Francisco unfold under a blanket of gentle cloud cover, whispering promises of clarity as the sun prepares to emerge. The air carries a refreshing chill, perfect for savoring the quiet moments before the day begins in earnest. A light breeze from the west-southwest stirs, creating a soothing symphony as it dances through the streets. By midday, expect the clouds to give way to a mostly sunny sky, revealing the cityscape in all its glory.

As you venture out, consider layering a light jacket over a comfortable shirt to embrace the coolness while remaining prepared for the warming sun. The marine layer, a faithful companion to this coastal city, may still linger in the mornings, veiling the iconic landmarks while allowing glimpses of glory as the fog retreats. This delightful mix of fog and sunshine sets the stage for a day filled with simple pleasures; perhaps a stroll along the waterfront, coffee in hand, or a leisurely visit to one of the vibrant local markets, where the air is filled with enticing aromas and friendly chatter. Enjoy the unique charm of this coastal city as the day unfolds, revealing the beauty that lies within its ever-changing skies.
